display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=5% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 5% oxygen desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba5 + hroa5 + hnrba5 + hnroa5 + carba5 + caroa5 + canba5 + canoa5 + oarba5 + oaroa5 + oanba5 + oanoa5 ) / slpprdp
